usage_instructions:
Execute the script with the following commands to run the experiment:

1. For the Gold-Filled-Head configuration (gold snippet at the beginning):
   ```
   python inference_repobench_p.py --language python --mode gold-filled-head --model_name codex
   python inference_repobench_p.py --language java --mode gold-filled-head --model_name codex
   ```

2. For the Gold-Filled-Tail configuration (gold snippet at the end):
   ```
   python inference_repobench_p.py --language python --mode gold-filled-tail --model_name codex
   python inference_repobench_p.py --language java --mode gold-filled-tail --model_name codex
   ```

3. After running both configurations, evaluate the results using:
   ```
   python evaluate_completion.py --model codex/gold-filled-head
   python evaluate_completion.py --model codex/gold-filled-tail
   ```

The script will automatically handle the RepoBench-P task, compose the cross-file context with the gold snippet at the head or tail position, use Codex (code-davinci-002) for next-line prediction, and evaluate using Exact Match, Edit Similarity, and CodeBLEU metrics.
